If you're non-binary that just means you're gonna be used in hexadecimal instead Also, does that mean they can't see this? 01001000 01100001 01101000 01100001 00100000 01111001 01101111 01110101 00100000 01110000 01110010 01101111 01100010 01100001 01100010 01101100 01111001 00100000 01100011 01100001 01101110 00100111 01110100 00100000 01110011 01100101 01100101 00100000 01110100 01101000 01101001 01110011
